attributes.action: MAKE IT LEGAL FOR 16 YEAR OLDS TO PURCHASE ALCOHOL IN PUBLIC HOUSES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A large percentage of young people binge drink on the streets. Make it legal for them to drink in public houses. They will then be able to enjoy a drink and socialise instead of drinking for the sake of getting drunk

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
